1: <pb/><t>Max yalon Jehová ayin axca ti': Camc'ulnej pax ix etbi, caxc'al chi mulji yetok mac chi yochej. Axca wal tu' chi yun in camc'ulnen eb et israelal, caxc'al chi yaoc eb nabal yin comon dios, c'al yiontok eb takin uva yin ofrendail bay juntzan comon dios tu', ẍi Cham.</t>
2: <t>Cax max in tojlanen is jec ix yin 15 siclo plata, yetok caneb quintal cebada, yuj yoc wetbiok junelxa.</t>
3: <t>Cax max walon bay axca ti': Ok ach ayjokxac'al wetok bay watut; palta toc'al ok jil-lej oc co ba etok. Manchakxa ach oc ajmulal, tamwal chach toj yetok junokxa winak. Tamwal ayin, c'am c'apax ix ok in saya', quin chi bay.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Caywal c'apax tu' Israel, najatil ok ayjok ec' yin c'am is reyal, c'al yin c'am yajawilal, c'amxa xajanbal bay Dios, tamwal ch'en ch'en ya yili yuj eb, c'amxa pichilej yet eb sacerdote, tamwal comon dios yet junjun nail eb.</t>
5: <t>Ok lajwok tu xin, a yet lajub c'ual, ok meltzoj eb israel sayon ec' Jehová is Diosal, c'al chaon eb junok yinatil David yoc reyalok eb. Caytu' ok yun yion ay ba eb satak Jehová, c'al chaon eb watx'il ok yak' Cham.</t>
